00040 #include "Predicate.hh"
00041 
00042 using namespace TREX::utils;
00043 using namespace TREX::transaction;
00044 
00045 /*
00046  * class TREX::transaction::Predicate
00047  */ 
00048 // structors :
00049 
00050 Predicate::Predicate(rapidxml::xml_node<> const &node)
00051   :m_object(parse_attr<Symbol>(node, "on")),
00052    m_type(parse_attr<Symbol>(node, "pred")) {
00053   if( m_object.empty() ) 
00054     throw PredicateException("Empty \"on\" attribute in XML tag");
00055   if( m_type.empty() )
00056     throw PredicateException("Empty \"pred\" attribute in XML tag");
00057   rapidxml::xml_node<> *iter = node.first_node("Variable");
00058   for(; NULL!=iter; iter = iter->next_sibling("Variable") ) {
00059     Variable var(*iter);
00060     restrictAttribute(var);
00061   }
00062 }
00063 
00064 Predicate::Predicate(Predicate const &other)
00065   :m_object(other.m_object), m_type(other.m_type), m_vars(other.m_vars) {}
00066 
00067 Predicate::~Predicate() {}
00068 
00069 
00070 // modifiers :
00071 
00072 void Predicate::restrictAttribute(Variable const &var) {
00073   if( !var.isComplete() )
00074     throw PredicateException("Predicate attribute is not fully defined");
00075   iterator pos = m_vars.lower_bound(var.name());
00076   if( end()!=pos && var.name()==pos->second.name() ) {
00077     pos->second.restrict(var);
00078   } else {
00079     // probably need to check if the varaible is valid/OK
00080     m_vars.insert(pos, std::make_pair(var.name(), var));
00081   }
00082 }
00083 
00084 // observers :
00085 
00086 Variable const &Predicate::getAttribute(Symbol const &name) const {
00087   const_iterator pos = m_vars.find(name);
00088   if( end()==pos ) 
00089     throw PredicateException("Attribute \""+name.str()+"\" is unknown");
00090   return pos->second;
00091 }
00092 
00093 std::ostream &Predicate::print_to(std::ostream &out) const {
00094   std::list<Symbol> vars;
00095   out<<m_object<<'.'<<m_type;
00096   listAttributes(vars, false);
00097   if( !vars.empty() ) {
00098     out<<'{'<<getAttribute(vars.front());
00099     for( vars.pop_front(); !vars.empty(); vars.pop_front() )
00100       out<<", "<<getAttribute(vars.front());
00101     out<<'}';
00102   }
00103   return out;
00104 }
00105 
00106 std::ostream &Predicate::toXml(std::ostream &out, size_t tabs) const {
00107   std::list<Symbol> vars;
00108   std::ostream_iterator<char> pad(out);
00109   
00110   std::fill_n(pad, tabs, ' ');
00111   out<<"<"<<getPredTag()<<" on=\""<<object()
00112      <<"\" pred=\""<<predicate()<<'\"';
00113   listAttributes(vars, false);
00114   if( vars.empty() )
00115     out<<"/>";
00116   else {
00117     out<<">\n";
00118     do {
00119       getAttribute(vars.front()).toXml(out, tabs+1)<<'\n';
00120       vars.pop_front();
00121     } while( !vars.empty() );
00122     std::fill_n(pad, tabs, ' ');
00123     out<<"</"<<getPredTag()<<'>';
00124   }
00125   return out;
00126 }
00127 
00128 void Predicate::listAttributes(std::list<TREX::utils::Symbol> &attrs,
00129                             bool all) const {
00130   const_iterator i = begin();
00131   const_iterator const endi = end();
00132   for( ; endi!=i; ++i )
00133     if( i->second.isComplete() &&
00134        ( all || !i->second.domain().isFull() ) )
00135       attrs.push_back(i->first);
00136 }
